SELECT psd.product_sell_daily_id, DATE_FORMAT(psd.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')as create_time, psd.total, product.product_id, product.product_name, shop.shop_id, shop.shop_name FROM tb_product_sell_daily as psd ,tb_product as product ,tb_shop as shop WHERE psd.shop_id =shop.shop_id and psd.product_id =product.product_id
and shop.shop_id=#{productSellDailyCondition.shop.shopId}
and product.product_name like '%${productSellDailyCondition.product.productName}%'
and date_format(psd.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') between date_format(#{beginTime},'%Y-%m-%d') and date_format(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and date_format(psd.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(#{beginTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and date_format(psd.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') < date_format(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_product_sell_daily(product_id,shop_id,create_time,total) ( SELECT a.product_id,b.shop_id,b.create_time,a.total FROM (SELECT DISTINCT product_id,COUNT(product_id)AS total FROM tb_user_product_map WHERE date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') =date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day) GROUP BY product_id)AS a LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT product_id,shop_id,date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d' )as create_time FROM tb_user_product_map WHERE date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') =date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day) )AS b ON a.product_id=b.product_id )

INSERT INTO tb_product_sell_daily(product_id,shop_id,create_time,total) ( SELECT p.product_id,p.shop_id,date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day),0 AS total FROM tb_product p WHERE p.product_id NOT IN (select product_id from tb_product_sell_daily where date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') =date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day)) )
